mapper.select: SELECT ec.id, ec.title, ec.price, ec.lesson_num as lessonNum, ec.cover, et.name as teacherName, es1.title as subjectOne, es2.title as subjectTwo FROM edu_course ec LEFT JOIN edu_course_description ecd ON ecd.id = ec.id LEFT JOIN edu_teacher et ON et.id = ec.teacher_id LEFT JOIN edu_subject es1 ON es1.id = ec.subject_parent_id LEFT JOIN edu_subject es2 ON es2.id = ec.subject_id WHERE ec.id = #{id}
